analysis.key_quote: This rule, as proposed, would only undermine (rather than strengthen), ongoing development of the current effective, merit-based evaluation and improvement system - ensuring the survival of an effective AND nonpartisan civil service deserves our respect and support.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about undermining merit-based evaluations and the potential for politicization in the removal of qualified employees, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
